tutorial.speak:
There are several ways to export your work to share with other computers or team members. Please note: Media files are not included in any exports - only the project data is exported. Media files will need to be transferred separately.
To export your current project, right-click on the project name and select "Export" from the menu.
When you click Export, the file will automatically save to your Documents folder, in the path: Documents / FreeShow / Exports.
To export a template, follow the same process: right-click on the template you want to export and select "Export".
To export a show, select the show you want to export, then click "File" in the top left corner of FreeShow and choose "Export".
Themes can also be exported. To access your themes, first click on Settings.
In Settings, select "Theme" from the left sidebar, then right-click on the Export button.
If you need to export all shows at once, go to File > Export, use the dropdown menu to select "All Shows", and click Export.
